title: Sparkling swimming pool, Bad Credit Ok, Unfurnished apartments
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Large loft apartments', '-Large studio apartments', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Storage Units', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Close to shopping', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-Easy freeway access', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
